Text:
Thanx STFmaryville for Black Panther v3 and v4

... can we get v1 , v2 and v5 too ?? :)
Dude, I just wanted to say thank you for all you do. You are fu**ing epic.

you're both welcome. i'm just good at finding stuff, and sharing is good for the soul.

also, i had never read this series and it's outstanding! hudlin's writing is action-packed and hilarious, and the art is great even after JR JR leaves ...
AWESOME! Thanks for fulfilling my request.
so if u do find volume1 ,  volume2 and volume5 , then pls do upload them . thanx man

Thanks so much for this.
Can I also chime in for a request for V5 from 2009 featuring Shuri as the Black Panther. I believe it lasted 12 issues.
Really do appreciate this.  Thank you!
